title: Travel & Adventure
description: Students learn to describe trips, use travel-related vocabulary, and talk about experiences at airports and destinations.
sample_dialogues: A: Where are you flying to? B: I’m going to London.
A: Did you pack your suitcase? B: Yes, I packed it last night.

title: Food & Culture
description: Students learn to discuss food habits, restaurants, and cultural traditions.
sample_dialogues: A: What’s your favorite dish? B: I love Italian pasta.
A: Do you prefer sweet or salty food? B: Sweet, definitely!

title: School & Education
description: Students learn to describe their school life, subjects, and daily routines.
sample_dialogues: A: What’s your favorite subject? B: I really like history.
A: Do you have much homework? B: Yes, especially in math.
